page.title: 17BOURTON POPULATION
page.content: BOURTON HAS A{POPULATION}OF{TWO {HUNDRED AND EIGHTEEN PEOPLE. }MOST WOMEN ARE HOUSEWIVES. THE MEN WORK IN COVENTRY, LEAMINGTON, RUGBY OR LOCALLY IN FRANKTON. IN FRANKTON MR. MITCHELL EMPLOYS PEOPLE ON HIS POTATO FARM. MOST CHILDREN GO TO THE FIRST OR MIDDLE SHCOOLS IN STRETTON ON DUNSMORE. IN{1967}THE POPULATION OF BOURTON WAS{270}BUT IS LESS NOW. SECONDARY SCHOOL CHILDREN GO TO HARRIS SCHOOL, LAWRENCE SHERRIFF BOYS GRAMMAR SCHOOL OR RUGBY HIGH SCHOOL FOR GIRLS OR ASHLAWN SCHOOL, ALL IN RUGBY. MANY OF THE FAMILIES IN BOURTON HAVE BEEN IN THE VILLAGE FOR SEVERAL GENERATIONS.
